original: Forsberg, Josef Fredrik, sparbanksdirektör, Hjo, f. 5/3/84 i Hjo av repslag :mäst. Johan Petter F. o. Mathilda Pettersson. G. 11 m. Anna Gund-ström. Barn: Marianne f. 13, Stina 17. — Anst. v. Hjo-Stenstorps Järnv. 97-05, kassör i firma H. Sjöstedt 05-27, kamr. v. Hjo bad 07-32, kamr. o. omb :man i Hjo Sparbank 27, verkst. dir. där sed. 37. Led. av styr. f. Hjo Sparbanik 36, v. ordf. sed. 37, led. av stadsfullm. 14, v. ordf. 21, ordf. 31-46, ordf. i kyrkofullm. sed. 43, i kyrkostämman sed. 43, i stadsfullm. be-redniutsk. 22-46, i ’stedsparkstyr. o. i hyresndn, ordf. i styr. f. komm. mel-lansk., ordf. i hamnbyggn :komm. 31-33 o. i stadshusbyggn :komm. 36-38, v. ordf. i folksk istyr., led. av kyrkoråd, kyrkogårdsnd, nykterh :nd o. allm. tax:ndn, insp. v. Hjo yrkessk., led. av styr. f. Hjo-Stenstorps Järnv. A-B, Västergötl. Biltrafik A-B o. Väster-götl. s. turisttrafikfören., suppl. i styr. f. Sv. sparb :fören., ordf. i IFK Hjo 20-41. Skr.: En färd i Guldkroken, div. art., medarb. i bokv. Västergötl. 46. RVO, Skandias GM, Dansk FrM, Svgifrfb förtjit. i guld, Västergötl. turisttrafikfören. förtj:t., IFK centr:-styr. silverplak.. Sv. ’Sparb :fören. st-GM.
translated: Forsberg, Josef Fredrik, savings bank director, Hjo, b. 5/3/84 in Hjo to rope maker: master Johan Petter F. and Mathilda Pettersson. Married for 11 years to Anna Gundström. Children: Marianne b. 13, Stina b. 17. Employed by Hjo-Stenstorps Järnväg 97-05, cashier at firm H. Sjöstedt 05-27, accountant at Hjo spa 07-32, accountant and representative for Hjo Savings Bank since 27, managing director since 37. Member of the board of directors of Hjo Savings Bank since 36, vice chairman since 37, member of the city council since 14, vice chairman since 21, chairman since 31-46, chairman of the church council since 43, in the church assembly since 43, in the city council committee since 22-46, in the city park board and in the housing committee, chairman of the municipal commission committee, chairman of the harbor building committee 31-33, and the city hall building committee 36-38, vice chairman of the elementary school board, member of the church council, cemetery board, temperance society committee, and general tax committee, inspector of Hjo vocational school, member of the board of directors of Hjo-Stenstorps Järnväg AB, Västergötland automobile traffic AB, and Västergötland tourist traffic association., representative in the board of Swedish savings association, chairman of IFK Hjo 20-41. Author of "A ride in Guldkroken," various articles, collaborator in the book "Västergötland" 46. Awards: RVO, Skandia GM, Danish FrM, a golden medal from Svgifrfb, recognized by Västergötland tourist traffic association, silver plaque from IFK central committee, and a Swedish Savings Association GM.
